item.title: SaulLM-54B & SaulLM-141B: Scaling Up Domain Adaptation for the Legal Domain
item.description: SaulLM-54B & SaulLM-141B achieve state-of-the-art performance on legal tasks by scaling up model size, employing a specialized instruction-following protocol, and aligning model outputs with human pre…
